title: (x) Amorphous hand drawn sans - Cartoon {Gary Milne (self)}
content:
Req. font ID -Reposted image

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Unknown font.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907035441/http:/typophile.com/files/Unknown%20font.png) | 188.63 KB |

 [‹ (x) Happy New Year! fat serif - ITC Grouch {Rainer}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907035441/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30458 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Gateway Controls, Inc. Garalde/Venetian - Palatinoi, Goudy Old Style {Paul H, Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907035441/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37317 "Go to next forum topic")
author: garymilne

comments.content:
Oh, this looks familiar. I’m checking Dafont.com, as I think this is a freeware font.

- Mike Yanega

Mike

I think this font is named: Cartoon from the Expresiv Classic Fonts which is no longer published.  
In a previous post you said:

Hefty’ is the FontBank digitization of ’Hellenic Wide’, and is was once in a Mac version too (which I have), when it was sold as part of the Expresiv Classic Fonts collection by Tiger Direct back in the mid-90’s.

- Mike Yanega

Can you check and see if this is the font???

Thanks  
Gary

While that statement about the Expresiv Classic Font collection is true, I don’t think this font is part of that collection — at least not the version of it that I have.

Did you send me a sample of this font to ID before Gary?

- Mike Yanega

I give up on Dafonts for this one. I checked the Comics, Cartoon, Handwritten, Brush, and Various Script categories. No luck.

Now it’s time for Angel to come and let us know what it is.

- Mike Yanega

Do you have a showing of Cartoon from the “Expresiv Art Fonts” collection Mike? I only have a small sample from the cover and it looks close.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907035441im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/expresiv_artfonts_1_5748.gif)

I think you may be right Angel. All of the same letters seem to match.

- Lex

That does look the same, but that isn’t one of the Expresiv font collections that I have. The one they called ’Classic’ was (I thought) the same as the one that Tiger Direct originally sold as ’FontBank’. These are the fonts that are still sold at the BuyFonts site. I think Gary’s information was basically correct, except for which Expresiv package it was in, and that I didn’t identify it.

- Mike Yanega
